=================
bitpit Tutorial
=================

This tutorial gives an introduction to how to use bitpit python library and its
features.

This is not a python tutorial. You are expected to have general knowledge in
python before you start this tutorial.

If you are looking for quick guide and do not want to spend much time reading,
have a look at the quick guide section.
